aboutMe:
Hi, My name is Muhammad Rido
You can call me Rido, Ido, Edo, and anything

Currently, I work as a Backend developer at an IT company located in Tangerang Regency. I have experience as Backend and Fullstack Developer since 2020, which began through a bootcamp programmer. As a developer, my tasks include development, testing, troubleshooting, bug fixing, tuning, and migration. Additionally, I have led teams in handling the development process
